channel.title: Comments on: Build embedded and start permanent in Elixir 1.0.4
channel.description: Plataformatec's place to talk about Ruby, Ruby on Rails, Elixir, and software engineering

item.title: By: josevalim
item.dc:creator: josevalim
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2015/04/build-embedded-and-start-permanent-in-elixir-1-0-4/comment-page-1/#comment-1474">X4lldux</a>.
Great catch. It has been fixed, thank you!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to X4lldux.

Great catch. It has been fixed, thank you!

item.title: By: X4lldux
item.dc:creator: X4lldux
item.description:
Shouldn't that be?:
defprotocol JSON do def encode(data) end
*defimpl* JSON, for: List do def encode(list) do # ... end end
item.content:encoded:
Shouldn’t that be?:

defprotocol JSON do
def encode(data)
end

*defimpl* JSON, for: List do
def encode(list) do
# …
end
end
